categories: Category:Sergeants and lieutenants of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Trailik was a male Human who served as a lieutenant in the Imperial Military of the reconstituted Sith Empire. He was stationed aboard Vaiken Spacedock during the Cold War.

The Basic Commendations Schematic Vendor for Imperial players, Lieutenant Trailik was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 2.0. He was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
